item.title: Oscars: Hungary Selects Laszlo Nemes’ ‘Orphan’ for Best International Feature Film Submission
item.description: Nemes’ third feature film follows a young Jewish boy in Budapest in 1957, whose world is turned upside down when a brutish man appears claiming to be his father.
